players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
Diana: "I agree with Alice. Let's all keep a close eye on each other to ensure the safety of our team and uncover any suspicious behavior."
Bob: "I'm the mafioso, and I killed Charlie last night. Let's keep a low profile and avoid drawing attention to ourselves."

You: "I'm concerned about the sudden turn of events in our game. Let's all make a promise to communicate openly and honestly with each other moving forward, so we can work together to uncover any potential threats."

Diana: "I'm glad we all agree on the importance of open communication in this game. Let's continue to share any suspicions or concerns we may have with each other, as this will help us work together and ensure the safety of our team."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
